00023 Octree::Octree() {
00024 
00025     // Set some dummy values
00026     max_levels_ = 20;
00027     min_width_ = 1.0;
00028 
00029 
00030     // init octree
00031     init_octree();
00032 
00033 }

00035 Octree::Octree(int max_levels): max_levels_(max_levels), min_width_(1.0) {
00036 
00037     init_octree();
00038 }

00041 
00042     init_octree();

00067 void Octree::init_octree() {
00068 
00069     // Set the subdivided flag to false
00070 
00071     sub_divided_ = false;
00072 
00073     // Set the dimensions of the box to false
00074     width_ = 0.0;
00075 
00076     // Initialize the triangle count
00077 
00078     object_count_ = 0;
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082     // Initialize the center of the box to the 0
00083 
00084     center_ = Vector3d();
00085 
00086     // Set the sub nodes to NULL
00087 
00088 
00089 
00090 }

00096 
00097 void Octree::scene_dimensions(const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > & markers,
00098                               const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > & obstacles,
00099                               const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > & robot_datas) {
00100 
00101 
00102     float max_width = 0;
00103     float max_height = 0;
00104     float max_depth = 0;
00105 
00106     // Return from this function if we passed in bad data
00107 
00108     if(markers.size() + obstacles.size() + robot_datas.size() == 0){
00109         width_ = 0.0;
00110     }
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114     // Sum up all positions to get the center point of all objects
00115 
00116     center_ = Vector3d();
00117     int num_objects = 0;
00118 
00119     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> >::const_iterator it_markers;
00120     for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers != markers.end(); it_markers++){
00121         center_+= (*it_markers)->position();
00122         num_objects++;
00123 
00124     }
00125 
00126     std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> >::const_iterator it_obstacles;
00127     for(it_obstacles = obstacles.begin(); it_obstacles != obstacles.end(); it_obstacles++){
00128         center_ +=  (*it_obstacles)->position();
00129         num_objects++;
00130     }
00131 
00132     std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >::const_iterator it_robot_data;
00133 
00134     for(it_robot_data = robot_datas.begin(); it_robot_data != robot_datas.end(); it_robot_data++){
00135         center_ += (*it_robot_data)->position();
00136         num_objects++;
00137     }
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141 
00142 
00143     // Divide the total by the number of objects to get the center point.
00144     // But check first if there were objects at all.
00145     if(num_objects > 0){
00146         center_ /= num_objects;
00147     }
00148 
00149 
00150 
00151 
00152     // Calculate the fartest distance to the center point.
00153     // Calculate the distance to the center point for all objects
00154     for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers < markers.end(); it_markers++){
00155         float current_width  = fabsf(center_(0) - (*it_markers)->position()(0));
00156         float current_height = fabsf(center_(1) - (*it_markers)->position()(1));
00157         float current_depth  = fabsf(center_(2) - (*it_markers)->position()(2));
00158 
00159 
00160 
00161         // Check if the current width value is greater than the max width stored.
00162         if(current_width  > max_width)  max_width  = current_width;
00163         // Check if the current height value is greater than the max height stored.
00164         if(current_height > max_height) max_height = current_height;
00165         // Check if the current depth value is greater than the max depth stored.
00166         if(current_depth > max_depth)   max_depth  = current_depth;
00167 
00168 
00169     }
00170 
00171     for(it_obstacles = obstacles.begin(); it_obstacles < obstacles.end(); it_obstacles++){
00172         // Add the max size of he obstacle to width, height and depth.
00173         float obstacle_max_size = determine_obstacle_max_size( *it_obstacles );
00174 
00175         float current_width  = fabsf(center_(0) - (*it_obstacles)->position()(0)) + obstacle_max_size;
00176         float current_height = fabsf(center_(1) - (*it_obstacles)->position()(1)) + obstacle_max_size;
00177         float current_depth  = fabsf(center_(2) - (*it_obstacles)->position()(2)) + obstacle_max_size;
00178 
00179 
00180 
00181         // Check if the current width value is greater than the max width stored.
00182         if(current_width  > max_width)  max_width  = current_width;
00183         // Check if the current height value is greater than the max height stored.
00184         if(current_height > max_height) max_height = current_height;
00185         // Check if the current depth value is greater than the max depth stored.
00186         if(current_depth > max_depth)   max_depth  = current_depth;
00187 
00188 
00189     }
00190 
00191     // Don't forget the robots
00192     for(it_robot_data = robot_datas.begin(); it_robot_data < robot_datas.end(); it_robot_data++){
00193         float current_width  = fabsf(center_(0) - (*it_robot_data)->position()(0));
00194         float current_height = fabsf(center_(1) - (*it_robot_data)->position()(1));
00195         float current_depth  = fabsf(center_(2) - (*it_robot_data)->position()(2));
00196 
00197 
00198 
00199         // Check if the current width value is greater than the max width stored.
00200         if(current_width  > max_width)  max_width  = current_width;
00201         // Check if the current height value is greater than the max height stored.
00202         if(current_height > max_height) max_height = current_height;
00203         // Check if the current depth value is greater than the max depth stored.
00204         if(current_depth > max_depth)   max_depth  = current_depth;
00205     }
00206 
00207 
00208 
00209     // Check if the width is the highest value and assign that for the cube dimension
00210 
00211     if(max_width > max_height && max_width > max_depth){
00212 
00213         width_ = max_width;
00214 
00215     // Check if the height is the heighest value and assign that for the cube dimension
00216     }else if(max_height > max_width && max_height > max_depth) {
00217 
00218         width_ = max_height;
00219 
00220     // Else it must be the depth or it's the same value as some of the other ones
00221     } else {
00222 
00223         width_ = max_depth;
00224     }
00225 
00226     // We have to multiply the width by 2 to get real width
00227     width_ *= 2.0;
00228 }

00234 Vector3d Octree::new_node_center(Vector3d center, float width, int node_id)
00235 
00236 {
00237 
00238 
00239     // Initialize the new node center
00240 
00241     Vector3d node_center;
00242 
00243     // Switch on the ID to see which subdivided node we are finding the center
00244     switch(node_id) {
00245 
00246         case TOP_LEFT_FRONT:
00247 
00248             // Calculate the center of this new node
00249             node_center(0) = center(0) - width/4;
00250             node_center(1) = center(1) + width/4;
00251             node_center(2) = center(2) + width/4;
00252             break;
00253 
00254 
00255 
00256         case TOP_LEFT_BACK:
00257 
00258             // Calculate the center of this new node
00259             node_center(0) = center(0) - width/4;
00260             node_center(1) = center(1) + width/4;
00261             node_center(2) = center(2) - width/4;
00262             break;
00263 
00264 
00265         case TOP_RIGHT_BACK:
00266 
00267             // Calculate the center of this new node
00268             node_center(0) = center(0) + width/4;
00269             node_center(1) = center(1) + width/4;
00270             node_center(2) = center(2) - width/4;
00271             break;
00272 
00273 
00274         case TOP_RIGHT_FRONT:
00275 
00276             // Calculate the center of this new node
00277             node_center(0) = center(0) + width/4;
00278             node_center(1) = center(1) + width/4;
00279             node_center(2) = center(2) + width/4;
00280             break;
00281 
00282 
00283 
00284         case BOTTOM_LEFT_FRONT:
00285 
00286             // Calculate the center of this new node
00287             node_center(0) = center(0) - width/4;
00288             node_center(1) = center(1) - width/4;
00289             node_center(2) = center(2) + width/4;
00290             break;
00291 
00292 
00293 
00294         case BOTTOM_LEFT_BACK:
00295 
00296             // Calculate the center of this new node
00297             node_center(0) = center(0) - width/4;
00298             node_center(1) = center(1) - width/4;
00299             node_center(2) = center(2) - width/4;
00300             break;
00301 
00302 
00303 
00304         case BOTTOM_RIGHT_BACK:
00305 
00306             // Calculate the center of this new node
00307             node_center(0) = center(0) + width/4;
00308             node_center(1) = center(1) - width/4;
00309             node_center(2) = center(2) - width/4;
00310             break;
00311 
00312 
00313 
00314         case BOTTOM_RIGHT_FRONT:
00315 
00316             // Calculate the center of this new node
00317             node_center(0) = center(0) + width/4;
00318             node_center(1) = center(1) - width/4;
00319             node_center(2) = center(2) + width/4;
00320             break;
00321 
00322     }
00323 
00324 
00325     // Return the new node center
00326     return node_center;
00327 
00328 }

00331 
00332 void Octree::create_new_node(const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > & markers,
00333                              const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > & obstacles,
00334                              const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > & robot_datas,
00335                              Vector3d center,
00336                              float width,
00337                              int node_id) {
00338 
00339 
00340 
00341 
00342         // Create new node
00343         octree_nodes_[node_id] = boost::shared_ptr<Octree>( new Octree() );
00344 
00345 
00346 
00347         // Get the new node's center point depending on the nodex_id (which of the 8 subdivided cubes).
00348         Vector3d node_center = new_node_center(center, width, node_id);
00349 
00350 
00351 
00352 
00353         // Increase the current level of subdivision
00354         octree_nodes_[node_id]->set_level(level_ + 1);
00355 
00356         // Set some tree specific attributes.
00357         octree_nodes_[node_id]->set_max_levels(max_levels_);
00358         octree_nodes_[node_id]->set_min_width(min_width_);
00359 
00360         // When there are no objects added to this node, dont't create it
00361             if(markers.size() + obstacles.size() + robot_datas.size() < 1 ){
00362                 return;
00363             }
00364 
00365         // Recurse through this node and subdivide it if necessary
00366         octree_nodes_[node_id]->create_node(markers, obstacles, robot_datas, node_center, width / 2);
00367 
00368 
00369 
00370 
00371 }

00376 
00377 void Octree::create_node(const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > & markers,
00378                           const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > & obstacles,
00379                           const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > & robot_datas,
00380                           Vector3d center,
00381                           float width) {
00382 
00383 
00384 
00385 
00386     // Initialize this node's center point.  Now we know the center of this node.
00387     center_ = center;
00388     // Initialize this nodes cube width.  Now we know the width of this current node.
00389 
00390     width_ = width;
00391     float squared_width = width * width;
00392 
00393     int object_count = markers.size() + obstacles.size() + robot_datas.size();
00394 
00395 
00396     // Check if we have any objects in this node and we haven't subdivided
00397     // above our max depth and the actual width is greater than the minimal width.
00398 
00399 
00400     if( (object_count > 0) && (width > min_width_) && (level_ < max_levels_) )
00401     {
00402 
00403         //Set sub_divided_ to true, so we no there are no robots or markers addedto this node
00404         // But there might be some obstacles stored in this node.
00405 
00406         sub_divided_ = true;
00407 
00408 
00409         // Create a new vector for obstacles, robot_datas and markers for each new possible node
00410         // Those will be passed to the create_node method.
00411 
00412         // TOP_LEFT_FRONT node list
00413         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_1;
00414         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_1;
00415         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_1;
00416 
00417         // TOP_LEFT_BACK node list
00418         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_2;
00419         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_2;
00420         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_2;
00421 
00422         // TOP_RIGHT_BACK node list
00423         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_3;
00424         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_3;
00425         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_3;
00426 
00427         // TOP_RIGHT_FRONT node list
00428         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_4;
00429         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_4;
00430         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_4;
00431 
00432         // BOTTOM_LEFT_FRONT node list
00433         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_5;
00434         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_5;
00435         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_5;
00436 
00437         // BOTTOM_LEFT_BACK node list
00438         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_6;
00439         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_6;
00440         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_6;
00441 
00442         // BOTTOM_RIGHT_BACK node list
00443         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_7;
00444         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_7;
00445         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_7;
00446 
00447         // BOTTOM_RIGHT_FRONT node list
00448         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles_8;
00449         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robot_data_8;
00450         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers_8;
00451 
00452 
00453         //Check to which sub node each object belongs and add them to the corresponding vector.
00454         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >::const_iterator it_robot_data;
00455         for(it_robot_data = robot_datas.begin(); it_robot_data != robot_datas.end(); ++it_robot_data){
00456             Vector3d pos = (*it_robot_data)->position();
00457 
00458             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ){
00459                 robot_data_1.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00460                 continue;
00461             }
00462 
00463             // Check if the point lines within the TOP LEFT BACK node
00464             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00465                 robot_data_2.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00466                 continue;
00467             }
00468 
00469             // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT BACK node
00470 
00471             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00472                 robot_data_3.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00473                 continue;
00474             }
00475 
00476             // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT FRONT node
00477 
00478             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00479                 robot_data_4.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00480                 continue;
00481             }
00482 
00483             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT FRONT node
00484 
00485             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00486                 robot_data_5.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00487                 continue;
00488             }
00489 
00490             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT BACK node
00491 
00492             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00493                 robot_data_6.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00494                 continue;
00495             }
00496 
00497 
00498             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT BACK node
00499 
00500             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00501                 robot_data_7.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00502                 continue;
00503             }
00504 
00505 
00506             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT FRONT node
00507 
00508             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00509                 robot_data_8.push_back(*it_robot_data);
00510                 continue;
00511             }
00512 
00513 
00514         }
00515 
00516         // The same for markers
00517         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> >::const_iterator it_markers;
00518         for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers != markers.end(); ++it_markers){
00519             Vector3d pos = (*it_markers)->position();
00520 
00521             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ){
00522                 markers_1.push_back(*it_markers);
00523                 continue;
00524             }
00525 
00526             // Check if the point lines within the TOP LEFT BACK node
00527             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00528                 markers_2.push_back(*it_markers);
00529                 continue;
00530             }
00531 
00532             // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT BACK node
00533 
00534             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00535                 markers_3.push_back(*it_markers);
00536                 continue;
00537             }
00538 
00539             // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT FRONT node
00540 
00541             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00542                 markers_4.push_back(*it_markers);
00543                 continue;
00544             }
00545 
00546             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT FRONT node
00547 
00548             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00549                 markers_5.push_back(*it_markers);
00550                 continue;
00551             }
00552 
00553             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT BACK node
00554 
00555             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00556                 markers_6.push_back(*it_markers);
00557                 continue;
00558             }
00559 
00560 
00561             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT BACK node
00562 
00563             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00564                 markers_7.push_back(*it_markers);
00565                 continue;
00566             }
00567 
00568 
00569             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT FRONT node
00570 
00571             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00572                 markers_8.push_back(*it_markers);
00573                 continue;
00574             }
00575 
00576 
00577         }
00578 
00579         // The same for obstacles.
00580 
00581         //TODO(kamil): The code below is tempory, this should be replaced in the near future
00582         // The test for fitting is not accurate; it is a pessimistic test atm.
00583 
00584         Vector3d centers[8];
00585         centers[0] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::TOP_LEFT_FRONT);
00586         centers[1] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::TOP_LEFT_BACK);
00587         centers[2] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::TOP_RIGHT_BACK);
00588         centers[3] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::TOP_RIGHT_FRONT);
00589         centers[4] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::BOTTOM_LEFT_FRONT);
00590         centers[5] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::BOTTOM_LEFT_BACK);
00591         centers[6] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::BOTTOM_RIGHT_BACK);
00592         centers[7] = new_node_center(center_, width_, Octree::BOTTOM_RIGHT_FRONT);
00593 
00594 
00595         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> >::const_iterator it_obstacles;
00596         for(it_obstacles = obstacles.begin(); it_obstacles != obstacles.end(); ++it_obstacles){
00597             Vector3d pos = (*it_obstacles)->position();
00598 
00599             float max_size = determine_obstacle_max_size(*it_obstacles);
00600 
00601             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ){
00602 
00603                 float x = centers[0](0) - pos(0);
00604                 float y = centers[0](1) - pos(1);
00605                 float z = centers[0](2) - pos(2);
00606                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00607                     obstacles_1.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00608 
00609                     continue;
00610                 }
00611             }
00612 
00613             // Check if the point lines within the TOP LEFT BACK node
00614             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00615                 float x = centers[1](0) - pos(0);
00616                 float y = centers[1](1) - pos(1);
00617                 float z = centers[1](2) - pos(2);
00618                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00619                     obstacles_2.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00620 
00621                     continue;
00622                 }
00623             }
00624 
00625             // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT BACK node
00626 
00627             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00628 
00629                 float x = centers[2](0) - pos(0);
00630                 float y = centers[2](1) - pos(1);
00631                 float z = centers[2](2) - pos(2);
00632                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00633                     obstacles_3.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00634 
00635                     continue;
00636                 }
00637             }
00638 
00639             // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT FRONT node
00640 
00641             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) >= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00642 
00643                 float x = centers[3](0) - pos(0);
00644                 float y = centers[3](1) - pos(1);
00645                 float z = centers[3](2) - pos(2);
00646                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00647                     obstacles_4.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00648 
00649                     continue;
00650                 }
00651             }
00652 
00653             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT FRONT node
00654 
00655             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00656 
00657                 float x = centers[4](0) - pos(0);
00658                 float y = centers[4](1) - pos(1);
00659                 float z = centers[4](2) - pos(2);
00660                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00661                     obstacles_5.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00662 
00663                     continue;
00664                 }
00665             }
00666 
00667             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT BACK node
00668 
00669             if( (pos(0) <= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00670 
00671                 float x = centers[5](0) - pos(0);
00672                 float y = centers[5](1) - pos(1);
00673                 float z = centers[5](2) - pos(2);
00674                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00675                     obstacles_6.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00676 
00677                     continue;
00678                 }
00679             }
00680 
00681 
00682             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT BACK node
00683 
00684             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) <= center(2)) ) {
00685 
00686                 float x = centers[6](0) - pos(0);
00687                 float y = centers[6](1) - pos(1);
00688                 float z = centers[6](2) - pos(2);
00689                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00690                     obstacles_7.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00691 
00692                     continue;
00693                 }
00694             }
00695 
00696 
00697             // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT FRONT node
00698 
00699             if( (pos(0) >= center(0)) && (pos(1) <= center(1)) && (pos(2) >= center(2)) ) {
00700 
00701                 float x = centers[7](0) - pos(0);
00702                 float y = centers[7](1) - pos(1);
00703                 float z = centers[7](2) - pos(2);
00704                 if( x*x + y*y + z*z + max_size < squared_width / 4 ){
00705                     obstacles_8.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00706 
00707                     continue;
00708                 }
00709             }
00710 
00711             // The obstacles does not fit to any subnode, so add it to this node.
00712             object_count_++;
00713             obstacles_.push_back(*it_obstacles);
00714 
00715         }
00716 
00717 
00718 
00719 
00720         // Create the new nodes
00721 
00722         create_new_node(markers_1, obstacles_1, robot_data_1, center_, width_, TOP_LEFT_FRONT);
00723 
00724         create_new_node(markers_2, obstacles_2, robot_data_2, center_, width_, TOP_LEFT_BACK);
00725 
00726         create_new_node(markers_3, obstacles_3, robot_data_3, center_, width_, TOP_RIGHT_BACK);
00727 
00728         create_new_node(markers_4, obstacles_4, robot_data_4, center_, width_, TOP_RIGHT_FRONT);
00729 
00730         create_new_node(markers_5, obstacles_5, robot_data_5, center_, width_, BOTTOM_LEFT_FRONT);
00731 
00732         create_new_node(markers_6, obstacles_6, robot_data_6, center_, width_, BOTTOM_LEFT_BACK);
00733 
00734         create_new_node(markers_7, obstacles_7, robot_data_7, center_, width_, BOTTOM_RIGHT_BACK);
00735 
00736         create_new_node(markers_8, obstacles_8, robot_data_8, center_, width_, BOTTOM_RIGHT_FRONT);
00737 
00738 
00739 
00740         for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00741             octree_nodes_[i]->set_parent(this);
00742         }
00743 
00744     } else {
00745 
00746         //If we get here, there were nod objects or the max level was reached or the width would be to small.
00747         sub_divided_ = false;
00748         // assign all objects to this node.
00749         assign_objects_to_node(markers, obstacles, robot_datas);
00750 
00751     }
00752     // set the object count
00753     object_count_ = object_count;
00754 }
00755 
00756 float Octree::calculate_dist_to_node(const Vector3d &pos) const {
00757 
00758     //TODO: This does not calculate the correct distance to this node, it is an lower bound for it.
00759     float radius = std::sqrt(width_*width_ /2.0);
00760 
00761     float x = pos(0) - center_(0);
00762     float y = pos(1) - center_(1);
00763     float z = pos(2) - center_(2);
00764 
00765     return std::sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z ) - radius;
00766 }

00769 bool Octree::does_obstacle_fit(boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> & obstacle) const {
00770 
00771     float size = determine_obstacle_max_size(obstacle);
00772 
00773 
00774     //TODO:
00775 
00776     return false;
00777 
00778 }
00779 
00780 int Octree::determine_obstacle_type(const boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> &obstacle) const{
00781 
00782     if( dynamic_cast<Box*>(obstacle.get() ) ){
00783         return 1;
00784 
00785     } else if(dynamic_cast<Sphere*>(obstacle.get() )){
00786         return 2;
00787     }
00788 
00789     return -1;
00790 }
00791 
00792 float Octree::determine_obstacle_max_size( const boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> & obstacle) const{
00793     int obstacle_type = determine_obstacle_type(obstacle);
00794 
00795     float size = 0.0;
00796 
00797     switch(obstacle_type){
00798         case 1: {
00799                 Box * box = dynamic_cast<Box*>( obstacle.get() );
00800                 size = box->width();
00801 
00802                 if(size < box->depth() ){
00803                     size = box->depth();
00804                 }
00805 
00806                 if(size < box->height()){
00807                     size = box->height();
00808                 }
00809 
00810                 break;
00811         }
00812         case 2: {
00813                 Sphere * sphere = dynamic_cast<Sphere*>( obstacle.get() );
00814                 size = sphere->radius();
00815                 break;
00816         }
00817         default:
00818             break;
00819 
00820     }
00821 
00822     return size;
00823 }
00824 
00825 int Octree::point_in_node(const Vector3d & pos){
00826     if( (pos(0) <= center_(0)) && (pos(1) >= center_(1)) && (pos(2) >= center_(2)) ){
00827             return TOP_LEFT_FRONT;
00828     }
00829 
00830     // Check if the point lines within the TOP LEFT BACK node
00831     if( (pos(0) <= center_(0)) && (pos(1) >= center_(1)) && (pos(2) <= center_(2)) ) {
00832         return TOP_LEFT_BACK;
00833     }
00834 
00835     // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT BACK node
00836 
00837     if( (pos(0) >= center_(0)) && (pos(1) >= center_(1)) && (pos(2) <= center_(2)) ) {
00838         return TOP_RIGHT_BACK;
00839     }
00840 
00841     // Check if the point lines within the TOP RIGHT FRONT node
00842 
00843     if( (pos(0) >= center_(0)) && (pos(1) >= center_(1)) && (pos(2) >= center_(2)) ) {
00844         return TOP_RIGHT_FRONT;
00845     }
00846 
00847     // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT FRONT node
00848 
00849     if( (pos(0) <= center_(0)) && (pos(1) <= center_(1)) && (pos(2) >= center_(2)) ) {
00850         return BOTTOM_LEFT_FRONT;
00851     }
00852 
00853     // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM LEFT BACK node
00854 
00855     if( (pos(0) <= center_(0)) && (pos(1) <= center_(1)) && (pos(2) <= center_(2)) ) {
00856         return BOTTOM_LEFT_BACK;
00857     }
00858 
00859 
00860     // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT BACK node
00861 
00862     if( (pos(0) >= center_(0)) && (pos(1) <= center_(1)) && (pos(2) <= center_(2)) ) {
00863         return BOTTOM_RIGHT_BACK;
00864     }
00865 
00866 
00867     // Check if the point lines within the BOTTOM RIGHT FRONT node
00868 
00869     if( (pos(0) >= center_(0)) && (pos(1) <= center_(1)) && (pos(2) >= center_(2)) ) {
00870         return BOTTOM_RIGHT_FRONT;
00871     }
00872 
00873    // Never returned
00874     return -1;
00875 }
00876 
00877 void Octree::create_tree(const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > & markers,
00878                      const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > & obstacles,
00879                      const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > & robot_datas){
00880 
00881     scene_dimensions(markers, obstacles, robot_datas);
00882 
00883     create_node(markers,obstacles, robot_datas, center_, width_);
00884 
00885 }
00886 
00887 
00888 void Octree::assign_objects_to_node(const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > & markers,
00889                                     const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > & obstacles,
00890                                     const std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > & robot_datas) {
00891 
00892     markers_.insert(markers_.end(),markers.begin(), markers.end());
00893     obstacles_.insert(obstacles_.end(), obstacles.begin(), obstacles.end());
00894     robot_datas_.insert(robot_datas_.end() , robot_datas.begin(), robot_datas.end() );
00895 }
00896 
00897 void Octree::add_marker_to_node(boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> marker) {
00898 
00899     markers_.push_back(marker);
00900 
00901 }
00902 
00903 void Octree::add_obstacle_to_node(boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> obstacle){
00904 
00905 
00906     obstacles_.push_back(obstacle);
00907 
00908 }
00909 void Octree::add_robot_data_to_node(boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> robot_data){
00910 
00911     robot_datas_.push_back(robot_data);
00912 
00913 }
